snippet: A Russian lawmaker's son accused of hacking computers at hundreds of U.S. businesses and stealing credit card information pleaded not guilty to 29 charges Friday....

headline.print_headline: Russian Accused of Hacking Is Arraigned in Seattle
headline.main: Russian Accused of Hacking Is Arraigned in Seattle

lead_paragraph: A Russian lawmaker's son accused of hacking computers at hundreds of U.S. businesses and stealing credit card information pleaded not guilty to 29 charges Friday.
